item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1627; 09:19PM; 334 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hpuNV2; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 74 firefighters extinguished the fire in 38 minutes with no injuries reported.. There was smoke but no fire on the 2nd floor and 3rd floors (both vacant). Firefighters are conducting smoke removal operations to clear the floors. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA2 RA27 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27; CH7; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Car into Structure; INC#1622; 09:08PM; 22570 W Lull St; MAP: https://bit.ly/35kjsTI; West Hills; One car into the garage of a single story, single family dwelling. The two occupants of the vehicle sustained only minor injuries with one transported. There were no injuries to the occupants (number unknown) of the home. Only the garage sustained damage to the structural integrity. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue is on scene evaluating the garage and the LA Building and Safety is responding to determine the status of the structure. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:37PM. LAPD Inc# 3890. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E305 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA106 RA72 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1627; 08:41PM; 334 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hpuNV2; Downtown; Six story, (pre-1943) building with fire on the 1st and 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E203 E209 E210 E211 E220 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA11 RA2 RA27 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1327; 06:06PM; 9460 N Cedros Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3spISIm; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN: 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 31 mins with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was in the attic. Cause and $ loss TBD. Structure Fire; INC#1327; 05:35PM; 9460 N Cedros Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3spISIm; Panorama City; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. There are no other structures exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E275 E290 E298 E7 E75 RA75 RA81 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0416; 07:54AM; 4633 W August St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tgsiKa; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. The quick interior attack made by firefighters prevented the fire from extended beyond the unit of origin. The primary and secondary searches found no occupants (reported to have exited prior to LAFD arrival). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E294 E68 E94 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0416; 07:38AM; 4633 W August St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tgsiKa; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; Two story, garden style apartment building with smoke showing from the second floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Fire attack made entry and located fire in one unit on the second floor.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E226 E26 E261 E294 E68 RA894 RA94 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0374; 06:46AM; 10968 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BUSxtM; Green Meadows; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending to the adjacent structures. Firefighters are continuing to conduct a thorough search of the property, which was not possible prior to knockdown. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0374; 06:29AM; 10968 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BUSxtM; Green Meadows; One story, single family dwelling well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the defensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 E64 RA264 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0315; 05:26AM; 1072 N West Kensington Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hob08s; Echo Park; 100 LAFD firefighters extinguished the flames in 32 minutes. Firefighters found two patients and have evaluated and transported both to the hospital. MEDIA: PIO Captain Branden Silverman en route, ETA 6:10am. LAFD Fire Investigators en route to perform cause investigation.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E11 E20 E201 E203 E209 E211 E220 E227 E35 E89 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA11 RA20 RA27 RA3 RA6 RA803 RA9 SQ21 T1 T11 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange
